channel.title: Duc Nguyen's Website
channel.description: Recent content on Duc Nguyen's Website

item.description: Brief summary PhD student with four years of experience in data science, analysed various types of datasets and came up with data-driven insights. Proficient in predictive modelling, data processing and data mining algorithms, as well as scripting languages. Current occupation PhD student in Artificial Intelligence, Applied Artificial Intelligence Institute, Deakin University, Australia Work experiences Year Description Mar 2015 - Oct 2018 NLP Research Assistant at Vietnam National University, Hanoi
